attributes.action: demand the immediate release of the 15 personnel kidnapped by the Iranians with the threat of military action (including all out war) and revise the rules of engagement in the area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Demand for release to be followed up with a briefing to inform all members of the global community that Her Majesty's Forces will not be used as a political punchbag and will defend themselves properly from this point.

Revisions to include updating the Rules of Engagement to allow all military personnel to employ up to and including lethal force to prevent kidnap by a foreign power.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
